message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter.  I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is quite a bit below its true worth. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not comfortable going above $10,000. Could you possibly come down to $12,000?
